body.name: Natural Glow Facial Toner | 83% Sea Buckthorn Extract | Korean Skincare, Vegan, for Sensitive Skin, 4.7 fl oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 20 hrs 24 mins
features: SEA BUCKTHORN EXTRACT : SimplyO’s facial toner consists of 83% of Sea Buckthorn extract, which is also known as a "Vitamin Tree" for its rich nutriment and minerals. It also brightens the skin tone and smooths out the skin texture.

STRENGTHEN SKIN BARRIER: Our facial toner provides double moisturization and protects your skin from dryness. It continuously strengthens the skin barrier as it combines moisture to hydrate all layers of skin. Additionally, SimplyO has included 5 types of white flowers; such as peony, silver bell, magnolia, madonna lily, and round leaf trumpet flower, that enhance the skin condition.

FOR ALL SKIN TYPES: It effectively works for all skin types, especially more for dry skin. We formulated our facial toner with 91% of reliable resources derived from nature, so that it suits every skin type and can enrich their skin care routine to achieve a beautiful glow from within.

100% VEGAN: Our products are all 100% vegan, which certainly means it does not contain any chemical substances that might cause skin problems. All products do not contain 100 inefficient ingredients and instead, we maximize the use of resources derived from nature. Moreover, SimplyO is against animal testing and the products are made 100% cruelty-free as the brand is officially certified by PETA (People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals).

ESSENCE TEXTURE: SimplyO’s facial toner has an essence texture that calms and soothes irritated skin. The soft, thin and fluid texture completely absorbs to your skin, which is effective for skin trouble treatments. This product is strongly recommended for people, who are willing to maintain a deep moisturizing effect for all seasons.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: What are the Key Points? 91% of Reliable Resources Derived from Nature 91% of Natural Glow Toner’s ingredients are derived from natural resources, so that it may suit every skin type. With a proper routine, you can achieve a beautiful glow from within through the process of enrichment. 5 Types of White Flower Natural Glow Toner contains peony, silver bell, magnolia, madonna lily, and round leaf trumpet to enhance skin condition and create a brighter complexion. Vitamin Tree Extract Natural Glow Toner consists of 83% sea buckthorn extract, also known as “vitamin tree extract”, for its rich nutrients and minerals. This extract helps the skin stay smooth and bright. Double Moisture Natural Glow Toner offers double layered moisturization, which further protects the skin from dryness.It creates and strengthens the skin’s barrier by adding a second layer.

Moist Essence Formula simplyO’s facial toner includes an essence that creates a smoother texture for the skin while relaxing any irritation.The soft fluid is easily absorbed by the skin, making it extremely effective towards any form of trouble.This formula is best suited for people who require skincare during all four seasons.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it.
reviews.reviewText: I'm a toner addict. Always looking for a nice scent and after result where my skin feels nice. Many I don't like, but this one I will be reordering.

reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Just a toner.
reviews.reviewText: It just a toner. It’s ok

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Greatly improved my skin
reviews.reviewText: This toner was perfect for my sensitive/slightly oily skin. It has a very minimal refreshing scent to it and feels nice and moisturizing on my skin. My t-line is very prone to pimples and my forehead is oily and gets the most pimples so this greatly helped improve my skin. I have been using it for around 3 months everyday and its no where near finished. Overall great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Not sticky,smells light and sweet, no residue ..gives a glow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2023

reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Products arrived as advertise

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great refreshing new product!!!
reviews.reviewText: This is a product that was recommended by a friend back home and I just love it!!! First, I have very sensitive skin that reacts badly to strong chemicals and this felt so soft and natural, it calmed and moisturized my skin right away. Second, the scent was floral but light and natural, actually made me want to put more on just to enjoy the smell. And lastly it comes in a light but sturdy bottle that is easy to use, carry in case of travel. I will definitely buy more of this and related products!!!

reviews.reviewText: Not really a toner - a bit viscous - doesn’t leave my face feeling fresh
